tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE voter_information (
    voter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    voter_name VARCHAR(50),
    voter_age INT,
    voter_gender VARCHAR(10),
    voter_party_affiliation VARCHAR(50),
    voter_address VARCHAR(100),
    voter_email VARCHAR(50),
    voter_phone_number VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE VoterInformation (
    voter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    voter_name VARCHAR(100),
    voter_age INT,
    voter_party_affiliation VARCHAR(50),
    voter_address VARCHAR(200)
);

CREATE TABLE CampaignAds (
    ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_title VARCHAR(100),
    ad_content TEXT,
    ad_target_audience VARCHAR(100),
    ad_budget DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE voter_interaction (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    voter_id INT,
    campaign_id INT,
    interaction_date DATE,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE voter_info (
    voter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    voter_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    political_affiliation VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE campaign (
    campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_targets (
    target_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    target_location VARCHAR(100),
    target_age_range VARCHAR(20),
    target_interests VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_engagement (
    engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_id INT,
    voter_id INT,
    engagement_type VARCHAR(20),
    engagement_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Voters (
    voter_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT NOT NULL,
    city VARCHAR(50),
    state VARCHAR(50),
    party_affiliation VARCHAR(50),
    registered_to_vote BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Campaigns (
    campaign_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    budget NUMERIC NOT NULL,
    campaign_goal TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Ads (
    ad_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
    ad_cost NUMERIC NOT NULL,
    ad_frequency INT,
    ad_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE AdEngagements (
    engagement_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_id INT NOT NULL,
    voter_id INT NOT NULL,
    engagement_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    engagement_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE CampaignReports (
    report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT NOT NULL,
    total_budget_spent NUMERIC NOT NULL,
    total_engagements INT NOT NULL,
    report_date DATE NOT NULL,
    report_comments TEXT
)
